ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisReappointment of JEAN-CLAUDE BOUCHARD of Gloucester, Ontario, to the position of Special Advisor to the Minister of Public Safety and Emergency Preparedness, as member of the RCMP Reform Implementation Council, to hold office during pleasure for a term of nine months, effective March 19, 2010.
